column5: This morning out on the east coast was what they call Dumping Day , hundreds of Lobster fishermen head to their favorite fishing grounds , suppose to be a real sight to see . Here they can be seen leaving the south western shores below Yarmouth Nova Scotia
seen here sitting waiting for the word Go!
this one has a seven foot tall decorated Christmas mounted up top ...
when the word Go comes across the radio , the work lights come on and their off ...
What is it? like opening day of the lobster season ?
yes Dave , the fishermen and the towns people who  came out to see them off this morning started at 4 am , Opening of their Lobster fishing season .
Heard on CTV that 3 of them fell overboard and had to be fished out. They were retrieved safely and taken to the hospital to be checked out.  Regards, Snowball
Theres going to be some fresh shipments coming to Barrie byes.  Thanks for the pics Ron.

Yes , they say opening day it the most dangerous day of the season , many boats have new Rockies on board , so theirs all ways some that end up going over board and need to be rescued , if they can find them . These three this morning were lucky , they were 80 km's out when they went over
Why not train your dog like this guy did??  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0nBldzJWNjM
I had the pleasure of going out on the first pull, never seen so many lobsters in my life.
You're there now?? Lucky!!!  Keep the updates coming. I love this stuff!  P.S if your bringing any back i'd like to make an order!!  S.
Here's a sad addition to your story Skip, it's a dangerous job out there.  http://www.theweathernetwork.com/news/articles/storm-hunter-joins-thousands-in-annual-dumping-day/60484/

Yes Lew to bad it happens , in a few pm's  I had first hand with a cousin over there  , a railing broke that let traps , bouys , ropes go over board taking two grew members with it , both were tangled up in the ropes once they hit the water and struggled to get free , one was able to cut him self free with a knife he had in his pocket but was unable to do any thing for his buddy as it was all ready to late for him . Today they were back at shore looking for new equipment so they could get back out and back to fishing .
